title: Twitter Archive Schema
description: Schema for Twitter archive JSON files
$comment:
This schema is auto-generated. To regenerate:
python -m gaiwan.schema_generator path/to/archive --output schema.json
Generated on: 2024-12-22T01:53:06.425401

email.description: User email, present in some account exports

id.description: Numeric tweet ID (as string to preserve precision)

id_str.description: String representation of tweet ID (preferred over id)

created_at.description: UTC timestamp when tweet was created

extended_entities.description: Extended media information, present when tweet contains media

possibly_sensitive.description: Content warning flag for sensitive media

favorited.description: Whether the tweet is favorited by the user

retweeted.description: Whether the tweet is retweeted by the user

truncated.description: Whether the tweet text was truncated

source.description: Client application used to post the tweet

in_reply_to_status_id.description: ID of tweet being replied to (if any)

in_reply_to_status_id_str.description: String ID of tweet being replied to (if any)

in_reply_to_user_id.description: ID of user being replied to (if any)

in_reply_to_user_id_str.description: String ID of user being replied to (if any)

in_reply_to_screen_name.description: Username of user being replied to (if any)

display_text_range.description: Start and end indices of displayable tweet text

community_id.description: Numeric ID of the community (as string)

id.description: Numeric tweet ID (as string to preserve precision)

id_str.description: String representation of tweet ID (preferred over id)

created_at.description: UTC timestamp when tweet was created

extended_entities.description: Extended media information, present when tweet contains media

possibly_sensitive.description: Content warning flag for sensitive media

favorited.description: Whether the tweet is favorited by the user

retweeted.description: Whether the tweet is retweeted by the user

truncated.description: Whether the tweet text was truncated

source.description: Client application used to post the tweet

in_reply_to_status_id.description: ID of tweet being replied to (if any)

in_reply_to_status_id_str.description: String ID of tweet being replied to (if any)

in_reply_to_user_id.description: ID of user being replied to (if any)

in_reply_to_user_id_str.description: String ID of user being replied to (if any)

in_reply_to_screen_name.description: Username of user being replied to (if any)

display_text_range.description: Start and end indices of displayable tweet text

keepPrivate.description: Whether to keep the archive private
